transcript.title: Prime Minister of Solomon Islands, the Hon Dr Derek Sikua MP upcoming visit
transcript.content:
I will be holding a private meeting and working lunch with the Prime Minister of Solomon Islands, the Hon Dr Derek Sikua MP in Canberra tomorrow (23 January, 2008).

Prime Minister Sikua arrived in Canberra this afternoon.

I welcome the opportunity for Australia and Solomon Islands to re-establish a close and cooperative relationship.

Canberra

Media contact: 02 6277 7744
